m_szDocTitle: The simple cactus may have the answer the clean tech industry needs
m_szDocSumamry: The simple cactus may have the answer the clean tech industry needs 1.0k The cactus may hold some answers. Image:  LightRocket via Getty Images 2016-04-29 00:30:48 UTC In the world of engineering, you can usually trust nature to have done it first, and better. A newly-developed fuel cell technology looks to the cactus to solve a problem involving this promising but complex form of clean energy, which generates power without emitting planet-warming greenhouse gases.Â  The technology, which is a thin plastic membrane, could help improve the performance of fuel cells to make them more useful for
